Package io.github.annabeths.GeneralControl

Class DebugUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.annabeths.GeneralControl.DebugUtils
  • public class DebugUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Tools to aid in debugging the game. Not available to the player.
    Since:
    Assessment 2

      • initDebugSettings

        public static void initDebugSettings()
        Load the default debug settings from the xml file. This is needed in the event a debug field is modified and built into the final game.
